TopicTitle: The MÃƒÂ¼n's Backstory (NOW WITH DUNA'S BACKSTORY!)

Articles.Content:
I spent the morning working in this comic, and though it's not stellar(Not a great digital drawer), I personally think it looks good.

Cast, in order of appearance:

-Minmus

-Mun

-Kerbin

-Vall

-Tylo

-Kerbol

-Ike

-Duna

Edited January 20, 2014 by Commissioner Tadpole
Haha nice work.
Good, reminds me of country balls! (That's a good thing )
Please do more!

Hehe, cool little tale there. Nicely done

*Switches to nitpick mode* Oh, and it's 'destabilizing' not 'instabilizing' *Disengage nitpick mode*
HA XD love it

Haha nice work.
HA XD love it

Thanks, you two!

Hehe, cool little tale there. Nicely done

*Switches to nitpick mode* Oh, and it's 'destabilizing' not 'instabilizing' *Disengage nitpick mode*

Oh, whoopsie. I alterady thought I was doing it wrong when I wrote 'instabilizing'.

Good, reminds me of country balls! (That's a good thing )

Yeah, these comics are mainly inspired by samio85's planet comics, who are, in turn, most likely also inspired by Polandball.

Please do more!

Will do! I have a comic in mind regarding Eve and Gilly(to whom I plan to be the two main characters).

Oh jeez the Ike one is hilarious. XD

I Have the worst luck going to Duna, my aerocapture trajectory likes to change itself to an Ike encounter AFTER I ENTER THE SOI and make my aerobrake too low, and I don't notice because time warp. Thank goodness for quicksaves.

I'll be looking out for more!
I swear, Ike hates space probes.

I swear, Ike hates space probes.

Sure does.

As for the new comic, it'll have to wait. I was midway through it, but suddently the lights went out and I lost everything, including motivation to make it.

Ike used PROTECT!

*thump*

It's super effective!

[Nice comic!]

Oh, I've just thought. Dres has got to be a thug or something, right? After all he's got this dirty great scar on his face! (EDIT: What I was thinking was the chunkier (and dumber) of the two Johns in 'Der Management' )

Edited January 17, 2014 by Patupi

Ike used PROTECT!

*thump*

It's super effective!

[Nice comic!]

Hehe, thanks!

Oh, I've just thought. Dres has got to be a thug or something, right? After all he's got his dirty great scar on his face! (EDIT: What I was thinking was the chunkier (and dumber) of the two Johns in 'Der Management' )

Actually I intended to make Dres annoyed because other planets barely know about him.

Here is a list of info about the planets and muns:

Name: Kerbol

Status: Star

Gender: Male

Quote: "I try my best to keep my sons and daughters happy and warm."

Personality: Calm, Quiet, Often looks after others but may have fits and is sometimes very strict.

Likes: Light, heat, Gilly, being praised

Dislikes: Rebels

Relationships: Guardian of the KSP planets

Name: Moho

Status: Small rocky planet

Gender: Male

Quote: "Little brats and their complaints. Back in my day, Kerbol would slap and punish me whenever I acted up. In those days you get away with anything."

Personality: Nostalgic, hates the current generation, often seen wearing sunglasses.

Likes: Being respected, other nostalgic bodies

Dislikes: Being told to live out of the past

Relationships: Best friends with Kerbol

Name: Eve

Status: Large rocky planet

Gender: Female

Quote: "Despite what you all think, I don't have mental issues, I endure them."

Personality: Quiet, cold, annoyed when others accuse her of having mental issues.

Likes: Gilly, Kerbin, high gravity, being understood

Dislikes: Being accused of having mental issues

Relationships: Adoptive mother of Gilly, best friends with Kerbin

Name: Gilly

Status: Adopted asteroid

Gender: Male

Quote: "I'm a space potato!"

Personality: Joyful, curious, somewhat childish

Likes: Minmus, Eve, messing around, defying laws of gravity

Dislikes: Jool, being treated like a baby by Eve

Relationships: Adoptive son of Eve, best friends with Minmus

Name: Kerbin

Status: Large rocky planet

Gender: Male

Quote: "My inhabitants may not be so bright, but that isn't a reason to think I am not, too."

Personality: Friendly, but socially awkward when around girls

Likes: The Space Program, Eve, telling stories to Minmus

Dislikes: Pollution, the Mun, being hit by asteroids, the Kethane Mining Program

Relationships: Father of Mun and Minmus, best friends with Eve

Name: The Mun

Status: Small rocky moon

Gender: Female

Quote: "Get out of my surface. I don't need another crater."

Personality: Brash, rude, grumpy.

Likes: Tormenting Kerbin with tidal waves

Dislikes: Minmus, Kerbals, meteors, having a base planted in her surface

Relationships: Daughter of Kerbin, older sister of Minmus. Dislikes them both.

Name: Minmus

Status: Captured comet

Gender: Female

Quote: "All I want is to have some fun!"

Personality: Cheerful, curious, childish

Likes: Gilly, Kerbin, the Space Program, having visits from Kerbals

Dislikes: The Mun, being eclipsed by the Mun, being tasted

Relationships: Daughter of Kerbin, younger sister of the Mun. Best friends with Gilly.

Name: Duna

Status: Medium rocky planet

Gender: Female

Quote: "You know what, despite everything, I miss being a moon of Jool."

Personality: Hot-headed, pratically explodes over the smallest insult

Likes: Jool, being a moon, pratically anything as long as it is away from Ike.

Dislikes: Ike. Nothing else.

Relationships: Lost daughter of Jool, friends with Dres.

Name: Ike

Status: Small rocky moon

Gender: Male

Quote: "Nobody should approach Duna as long as I am near."

Personality: Overprotective, hateful and clingy. Thinks that he is Duna's boyfriend.

Likes: Duna, destroying space vessels, being alone with Duna.

Dislikes: Kerbals, space vessels, pratically anything that dares approach Duna.

Relationships: One-sided love relation with Duna, enemies with the Kerbal Space Center.

Name: Dres

Status: Large asteroid

Gender: Asexual

Quote: "Oh no, do continue counting 'Kerbin, Duna, Jool and Eeloo'. It's not like I care being ignored."

Personality: Angry, very short temper, even shorter than Duna's.

Likes: Being recognized, being visited by Kerbals, exotic locations, having company of other asteroids.

Dislikes: Being ignored.

Relationships: Friends with Duna, best friends with other asteroids.

Name: Jool

Status: Large Gas Planet

Gender: Asexual(Male overtone)

Quote: "'I am a monster'? Do you think I gained all those moons by hogging them? I adopted them!"

Personality: Quiet, generous, but often intimidating.

Likes: Comforting Eeloo, Helping others in need, adopting abandoned celestial bodies, assisting Kerbals to aerobrake.

Dislikes: Being falsely accused of being a thug.

Relationships: Father of Laythe, Vall, Tylo, Bop, Pol, Duna and Eeloo

Name: Laythe

Status: Medium rocky moon

Gender: Female

Quote: "Oh look, guys, I have an atmosphere! What, you thought I didn't have an atmosphere? Silly Kerbals, thinking moons don't have atmospheres! Blah blah blah blah..."

Personality: Diva, obsessed with atmospheres, extremely talkative, social butterfly

Likes: Jool, Bragging about her atmosphere and oceans

Dislikes: Tylo, atmosphereless bodies, oceanless bodies, ugly moons like Tylo

Relationships: Second oldest child of Jool, one-sided hate relation with Tylo

Name: Vall

Status: Small ice moon

Gender: Female

Quote: "This is a spiffy morning, old chaps, and there isn't any better morning than one with tea."

Personality: Classy, elegant, well-dressed.

Likes: Being educated, having a giant mug of space tea, sharing discussion with Bop and Jool

Dislikes: Ineducated bodies like Ike and Laythe.

Relationships: Third oldest child of Jool, friends with Bop

Name: Tylo

Status: Large rocky moon

Gender: Male

Quote: "I don't care."

Personality: Quiet, careless, loner.

Likes: Being alone, crashing Kerbal landers.

Dislikes: Being with others.

Relationships: Oldest child of Jool.

Name: Bop

Status: Captured asteroid

Gender: Male

Quote: "THE POWER OF KRAKEN COMPELS YOU!"

Personality: Unexpected, somewhat zealous.

Likes: The Kraken.

Dislikes: Pol.

Relationships: Second youngest child of Jool.

Name: Pol

Status: Captured asteroid

Gender: Male

Quote: "Eeeeeeeee..."

Personality: Mentally disabled, somewhat cannibalistic

Likes: Stars, drooling, imagining things, nomming on Bop.

Dislikes: Pol's core brain is incapable of processing the word "Dislike".

Relationships: Youngest child of Jool.

...

...

...

...

Name: Eeloo

Status: Small dwarf planet

Gender: Female

Quote: "I guess nobody will understand me..."

Personality: Shy, quiet, socially awkward. Afraid of other planets.

Likes: Being comforted by Jool, being visited by Kerbals.

Dislikes: Being completely alone in the dark, harsh, cold vacuum of space.

Relationships: Lost daughter of, and best friends with Jool

Edited January 19, 2014 by Commissioner Tadpole

Dislikes: The Mun, being eclipsed by the Mun, being tasted

Hah! Good one! *grins*
Out of these I'd say I am a cross between Vall and pol
Aww, poor Eeloo
Moho: Has a secret sunglasses room.
Aweasome! More! I need more!
I can make more, if you want.
Yes, make more!

-personalities n' stuff-

Don't you think the loner planets would like space ships?

Loner planets being: Dres, Eeloo and... Dres...

Because, Dres likes recognition, and Eeloo says nobody understands her. Sounds like loneliness to me.
We need moar comics!!

Don't you think the loner planets would like space ships?

Loner planets being: Dres, Eeloo and... Dres...

Because, Dres likes recognition, and Eeloo says nobody understands her. Sounds like loneliness to me.

Yeah, maybe I should update it.

And you guys want more comics? You'll get more comics! I'll work on one right now.

This is awesome!

Somehow these reminded me of a short comic with Earth and Mu.. I mean Moon, where the Earth asks moon "Hey baby. Wanna orbit?" and Moon asks if his condition is contagius. Earth assures it's not and a few billion years later come the humans...

idea for comic: Minmus trys to convince kebol to help Mun, but since he can't minmus goes back in time to defend the Mun from the comets. In the end she explodes on the muns north pole, creating the famous "Mun hole"
